description: This call is made when a pilot turns from flying parallel to the runway to a new turn, setting up for a specific type of approach called an 'initial' approach.
A pilot makes this call when they are turning to set up for a 'low go' approach, which is a simulated landing where the plane flies very close to the runway before taking off again.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, downwind for low go

description: This call is made when a pilot is turning onto the 'base' leg of the circuit and is preparing for a full stop landing at the end of the maneuver.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, downwind for full stop

description: A pilot makes this call when turning from the 'base' leg onto the final straight path toward the runway, confirming their intention for a 'low go' approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, base, for low go

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked S/W calm, report final runway 14

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Gears are green, s/w copied, runway 14, call you final {Call Sign}

description: A pilot makes this call when turning from the 'base' leg onto the final straight path toward the runway, confirming their intention for a full stop landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, base, for full stop

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked S/W calm, report final runway 14

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Gears are green, s/w copied, runway 14, call you final {Call Sign}

description: This call is made during a 'touch-and-go' landing (touching the runway and immediately taking off again) to report entering the 'crosswind' leg of the circuit.
This is a call made when a plane is on the final, straight approach to the runway, confirming it will perform a 'low go' (a pass over the runway without landing).

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, recheck gears down and locked S/W calm, runway 14, cleared for low go

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Gears are green, s/w copied, runway 14, cleared for low go {Call Sign}

description: This is a call made when a plane is on the final, straight approach to the runway, confirming it will perform a full stop landing.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, recheck gears down and locked S/W calm, cleared to land

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Gears are green, s/w copied, runway 14, cleared to land {Call Sign}

description: This is a call made when a plane is turning from the 'crosswind' leg to the 'downwind' leg of the circuit (flying parallel to the runway in the opposite direction of landing).
